testimonials.name: Richard Sposato
testimonials.text: I managed Israel while we both worked on the Platform Infrastructure team at Anaplan. While working with him, I quickly learned he was a capable addition to our team. He was professional in communicating with others, competent in getting his work done well and on time, and a team player who worked well with everyone. [...] His hard work and technical skills helped us complete the Lion project on time. [...] He has my full confidence.

testimonials.name: Jason Rosendale
testimonials.text: It's difficult to write a recommendation that does service to Israel's level of expertise or the importance that his work has made to the engineering team at Entelo. [...] The engineering team relies heavily on him (he knows our infrastructure inside and out, he built our deployment pipeline, he set up our metrics and logging systems); but at the same time he has made sure that the engineering team does not need to rely on him [...] He prevents engineers from having to spend their time dealing with infrastructure [...] I could not do my job effectively without Israel's help.

testimonials.name: Tom Holder
testimonials.text: I worked with Israel for a couple of years on our SaaS product ContactZilla. Working with Israel was a delight. He's an enthusiastic, smart and considered character with a real ability to learn knew technologies. He's never phased by a challenge and approaches everything with a professional manner and importantly with good humour. I'd definitely not hesitate to work with Israel again.
